companies_en.name: Anue
description: Redesigned the old website using Next.js 14, with experience in RSC (React Server Components).
Packaged the website into an image using Docker and deployed it to the GitLab Container Registry with GitLab CI (Docker, CI).
Experience with data visualization libraries (Highcharts, TradingView).
Sent success or failure messages to a Slack channel upon GitLab deployment (Shell Script).
Collected user data using GTM, GA3, and GA4 (Google Analytics).
Improved SEO (correct use of tags, meta data).
Enhanced web performance (Core Web Vitals, SSR, Lazy Load).
Reduced the number of API calls (React Query, Caching).
Upgraded the old website runtime environment (from Node.js 8 to Node.js 12).
Experience with Unix-like working environments (Oh My Zsh).
Maintained existing projects and added new features, around 10 different repositories.

companies_en.name: Aptan Inc.
description: Create new feature and reusable React components.
Communicate with backend through RESTFUL API and Graphql client.
Write code that meets the team's coding style.
